nodes.text: The moon of Drazkel was a moon located in the Drazkel system. After capturing the Jedi Padawan Eldra Kaitis, Darth Maul and his crew's stolen Shekelesh-class freight gunship was shot down and crashed onto the moon by forces belonging to Xev Xrexus. Xrexus then sent criminals to kill the Padawan and her captives.
